#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
unsigned long long s,e,x,y,n,t,i,b;

int main()
{
  scanf("%llu",&t);
  while(t--)
  {
      scanf("%llu %llu",&s,&e);
      scanf("%llu",&n);
      b=0;
      for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
      {
          scanf("%llu %llu",&x,&y);
          if(!(x>=e||y<=s))
           b=1;
      }
      if(b==1)
        printf("NO\n");
      else
        printf("YES\n");

  }
    return 0;
}
